Meeting Minutes

Purpose

The pupose of this template is to record any meetings related to Architecture or Technology

This could be meetings with the PO or CTO of the company or simply with the development team. Most Architectural/Technical concerns brought up here start off as discussion topics, evolve into action items and finally end up as decision logs.

2022-08-10 Meeting Notes

Participants

  • John Doe
  • Bob
  • Smith

Goals

Discuss changes need to do for the dashboard

Discussion topics

TimeItemPresenterNotes
10:32:17 AMDashboard requirementSmith

Need to list down all the invoices and required following functionalities

  • Sorting
  • Filtering
  • Search
  • Grouping
  • Pagination
  • Single row actions
  • Batch actions by selection
  • Expandable rows and/or leveled rows (where a row can have children/subrows)

Action items



Decisions

  • Create decision log with the alternate solutions and find best cost-effective solution
